events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further assessment based on your skills.
A recruiter specializing in software engineer roles has been assigned to review your application and coordinate next steps.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background and skills relevant to the software engineering role.
Thank you for the screening call. I am very excited about the opportunity and looking forward to the next steps.
Your technical interview with our engineering team has been scheduled for May 7th at 3 PM UTC.
The technical interview was completed successfully. Our engineers were impressed with your problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled an HR interview for you on May 10th to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well. You conveyed a strong alignment with our company values and expectations.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position with our company, including a competitive salary and benefits.
